mapper.select: select count(*) from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no}
select count(*) from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and product_name like #{keyword}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and del_check like 'N' order by purchase_count desc) a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and del_check like 'N' order by manufacture_date desc) a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3
select count(*) from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and discount_no is not null
select * from store_popularity_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and del_check like 'N' and expiration_minute <= 72*60 and expiration_minute > 0
mapper.update: update tb_store_product set del_check = #{toggle} where store_product_no = #{spnum}
update tb_store_product set manufacture_date = #{mdate}, quantity = #{quantity} where store_product_no = #{spno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_store_product where store_no=#{store_no} and product_no = #{product_no} and manufacture_date = #{manufacture_date}
mapper.update: update tb_store_product set quantity = (select quantity+#{sp.quantity} from tb_store_product where store_no=#{store_no} and product_no = #{product_no} and manufacture_date = #{manufacture_date}) where store_no=#{sp.store_no} and product_no = #{sp.product_no} and manufacture_date = #{sp.manufacture_date}
mapper.select: select count(*) from store_product_view where store_no = #{store_no} and manufacture_date >= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd'))
